fields.description: This is the base list price of one instance of this product, excluding options.
fields.label: List Price
fields.name: BaseListPrice

fields.description: This is the selling price of one instance of this product, excluding options, but including discounts and charges directly associated with this product.
fields.label: Base Selling Price
fields.name: BaseSellingPrice

fields.description: This is the ID of the object from which this object was copied.
fields.label: Cloned From Id
fields.name: ClonedFromId

fields.description: This is the total of the cost of the product without its options after applying charge and discount costs
fields.label: Cost
fields.name: Cost

fields.description: This is the ID of the user who created this object.
fields.label: Created By Id
fields.name: CreatedById

fields.description: This is the time when this object was created.
fields.label: QuoteLine Created
fields.name: CreatedDate

fields.description: This is the currency ISO code for this object.
fields.label: Currency
fields.name: CurrencyIsoCode

fields.description: This is the description of the quote line.
fields.label: Description
fields.name: Description

fields.description: This is the extended description for the product.
fields.label: Extended Description
fields.name: ExtendedDescription

fields.description: This field uniquely identifies this object from all other objects in the system.
fields.label: Id
fields.name: Id

fields.description: This field tells if this product is included in quote export to salesforce.com.
fields.label: Include In Export
fields.name: IncludeInExport

fields.description: This field tells if this quote line is included in quote totals.
fields.label: Included
fields.name: IsSelected

fields.description: This is the unique indexed ID in the ICS configuration database for the product associated with this quote line. It should not be used for display purposes.
fields.label: Key
fields.name: Key

fields.description: This is the ID of the user who last modified this object.
fields.label: Last Modified By Id
fields.name: LastModifiedById

fields.description: This is the time when this object was last modified.
fields.label: QuoteLine Last Modified
fields.name: LastModifiedDate

fields.description: This is the BaseListPrice plus its selected options ListPrice. In the case of a nested product, all of its descendents are included.
fields.label: List Price
fields.name: ListPrice

fields.description: This is the name of the quote line.
fields.label: Name
fields.name: Name

fields.description: This is the total selling price for any nested products attached to this line.
fields.label: Nested Selling Price
fields.name: NestedProductsSellingPrice

fields.description: This is the total of the cost of the product after applying charge and discount costs
fields.label: Options Cost
fields.name: OptionsCost

fields.description: This is the selling price of all the options selected with this product.
fields.label: Options List Price
fields.name: OptionsListPrice

fields.description: This is the gross profit margin for the quote. This is calculated as the OptionsProfit divided by the OptionsSellingPrice.
fields.label: Options Margin %
fields.name: OptionsMargin

fields.description: This is the total profit for the product. This is total selling price less total cost
fields.label: Options Profit
fields.name: OptionsProfit

fields.description: This is the selling price of all the options selected with this product, including discounts and charges directly associated with those options.
fields.label: Options Selling Price
fields.name: OptionsSellingPrice

fields.description: This is the order code for the product associated with this quote line.
fields.label: Order #
fields.name: OrderCode

fields.description: This is the ID of the quote that includes this quote line.
fields.label: Parent Quote Id
fields.name: ParentQuoteId

fields.description: This is the ID of the quote line that is the parent product for this nested product. If this quote line is not a nested product, then this value is null.
fields.label: Parent QuoteLine Id
fields.name: ParentQuoteLineId

fields.description: This is the ID of the product for this quote line.
fields.label: Product Id
fields.name: ProductId

fields.description: This is the quantity of the product for this quote line.
fields.label: Qty
fields.name: Quantity

fields.description: This is the ID of the quote line that is the root for this nested quote line. If this quote line is not nested, then this field references this QuoteLine.
fields.label: Root Quote Line Id
fields.name: RootQuoteLineId

fields.description: This is the sequence of this product within its quote, or for a nested product, the sequence within it's parent.
fields.label: Sequence
fields.name: Sequence

fields.description: This is the BaseSellingPrice times the quantity.
fields.label: Total Base Selling Price
fields.name: TotalBaseSellingPrice

fields.description: This is the total of the cost of the product with its options after applying charge and discount costs
fields.label: Total Cost
fields.name: TotalCost

fields.description: This is the gross profit margin for the quote line. This is calculated as the TotalProfit divided by the TotalSellingPrice.
fields.label: Total Margin %
fields.name: TotalMargin

fields.description: This is the OptionsSellingPrice times the quanity.
fields.label: Total Options Selling Price
fields.name: TotalOptionsSellingPrice

fields.description: This is the total profit for the product. This is total selling price less total cost
fields.label: Total Profit
fields.name: TotalProfit

fields.description: This is the total selling price of this line, which is the unit selling price multiplied by the quantity.
fields.label: Total Selling Price
fields.name: TotalSellingPrice

fields.description: This is the list price of one instance of this product, which includes options.
fields.label: Unit List Price
fields.name: UnitListPrice

fields.description: This is the selling price of one instance of this product, which includes options, discounts and charges for that product and its options.
fields.label: Unit Selling Price
fields.name: UnitSellingPrice
